title: An epitaph, or funerall inscription, vpon the godlie life and death of the right worshipfull Maister William Lambe Esquire founder of the new conduit in Holborne, &c. Deceased the one and twentith of April, and intumbed in S. Faiths Church vnder Povvles, the sixt of Maie next and immediatly follovving. Anno. 1580. Deuised by Abraham Fleming.
author: Fleming, Abraham, 1552?-1607.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Henrie Denham, for Thomas Turner, and are to be solde at his shop at Guild-hall gate,
